segments.text: Excuse me , are you Mrs . Green from England ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm pleased to meet you , Mrs . Green . My name is Myra . I work in Beijing Institute of Technology . I came here to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's kind of you to meet me at the airport .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Welcome to Beijing . Is this your first time in China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I have visited China several times , but it's my first visit to Beijing and I think it's a great honor to be invited to your beautiful city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's our pleasure to have you here . I hope you will have a pleasant stay here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I'm sure I will have a wonderful time here .
segments.speaker: S2
